title: Features
subTitle: Key areas of research
content: This experiment focuses on a few primary research areas, all of which fit the theme of "scalability." Scalability in regards to both development costs and service provider fees.

features.name: CI/CD Pipeline
features.description: Fully integrated DevOps pipeline to production, with preview builds and historical build reports

features.name: Serverless Architecture
features.description: Completely serverless architecture with support for real-time data synchronization and multi-tenant session persistence

features.name: Stateless Sessions
features.description: Signed and secured sessions validatable at all levels of the request, without leaking sensitive data to 3rd parties microservices.

features.name: Headless CMS
features.description: Externally managed content by non-technical users exposed behind a GraphQL API for use in static site generators or server-side rendering

features.name: Realtime Data
features.description: Remote database accessible through REST, GraphQL, and Real-time APIs, including advanced features such as stored procedures, row-level security policies, and more

features.name: Progressive Web App
features.description: Get the most value from modern web APIs by serving static content with progressive client-side enhancements and offline support
